Reviews.Content: Good Value, great location, clean and friendly. Hotel was in a superb location right in front of the piazza S.Maria novella and a very short walk to the other attractions. Having turned up without booking we were delighted to find it and chose to stay in a room with a shared bathroom. The room was very clean although basic, it did have a table and sink, but great for 49 euro's a night. The bathroom was also extremely clean although very small, the shower was amazing.The man on reception was extremely helpful recomending places to eat, his english was fantastic.Breakfast was not provided but there were many cafe's around and it was only a short walk to a small supermarket.Overall a great place to stay if you want to see florence on a budget.
Reviews.Author: jimbo1916
